nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Front Row Seat Storybook

Star Wars: The Clone Wars Front Row Seat Storybook is a children's storybook that tie into Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It was published in the UK on August 7, 2008 as part of Ladybird's Front Row Seat Storybook series.

Join the Jedi Knights on an exciting intergalactic Clone Wars adventure. Deep in the Clone Wars universe, a mystery super weapon has struck and disappeared without a trace. But where has it come from? The fate of the Star Wars universe rests in the hands of the daring Jedi Knights. Get reading and join the adventure! It is an exciting addition to any Star Wars fans collection.
